summary: Well, is the Dremora with skills bonuses and abilities from TES IV: Oblivion
descriptionHtml:
Hi, this is my first mod, it is not too advanced but I wanted to race Dremora was balanced and not too pimped up. Skills and abilities were based from the TES IV: Oblivion

Skills:

Heavy armor and Destruction: +10
one-handed, Pickpocket and Archery +5
That makes the total 35, as in other races.

Abilities:

Dremora Magicka - Dremoras have an additional 50 points of Magicka
Deadric Nature - Gives Deadras Dremora and other Deadras fire resistance (35), resistance to magic (25) and susceptibility to shock (20).

Description of the Race:

Dremora are humanoid Daedra aligned with the Daedric Prince Mehrunes Dagon, Often very intelligent, and Generally hostile. In lore, they are said to be in large numbers in clans within the terrifying realms of Mehrunes\' Wastes of Oblivion. Either Dremora are melee fighters or spellcasters, differentiated by Their clothing.

1st Update: Added hairstyles, scars, beards and eyes for male Dremora. For Female I add this in next weekend :) 

2nd Update: Added more eyes and beards for male. For the female Dremora I\'ve added all the possible add-ons that are displayed correctly (especially elven), carryweight changed to 300 from 350 and changed smithing from pickpocket :)
author: Trzyzet
